description: An open-source, self-hosted bookmark manager that lets you manage your favorite links in an intuitive interface

collection.title: Create collections
collection.text: Organize your bookmarks by collections to keep your links tidy and find them easily.

link.title: Manage Links
link.text: Add, edit, and manage your bookmarks with a simple and intuitive interface.

search.title: Search
search.text: Quickly find the bookmark you're looking for with the powerful search feature.

extension.title: Browser extension
extension.text: Enhance your experience with the official MyLinks browser extension.

contribute.title: Contribute to MyLinks
contribute.text: Suggest improvements you would like to see on MyLinks.
